item.description:
After being in Boston this past March, Walk the Moon just announced more tour dates for the US. These guys are gaining an audience and look to be a lot of fun. Admittedly, January 24 is so far out it is a little hard to think about, but let's keep it on the radar and if you eventually decide to get a ticket just RSVP back here.  Tickets go on sale this Friday, 10/5.

Info on the Show: Doors at the Paradise open at 7 pm and the show is scheduled to start at 8 pm.  Nothing yet about an opening act, but I'll be sure to update this event as things get announced or change.

Where to Meet: let's meet at T's pub, which is at 973 Comm Ave, basically right next door to the Paradise, at 6:00 pm, in case anyone wants to get a drink, etc. and we have time to meet, gather and chat a little.  We will head over to the Paradise at 6:45 pm. Prior to the event I'll email attendees with my cell phone number.

Questions? Please email me directly from my profile page any time.

http://walkthemoonband.com/news/2012/10/01/new-tour-dates-announced/

Here's one of their songs getting air time. Great sound and the video is a bit of a hoot:

http://vimeo.com/16850431
item.name: Walk the Moon
